news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: AiDash, a SaaS firm focused on climate-resilient infrastructure, completed an oversubscribed Series C funding round, raising $58.5 million. Lightsmith Group and Sabanci Climate Ventures participated, highlighting investor confidence. Additionally, AiDash launched an ESOP buyback program for its employees in India, signaling growth and employee investment.

overview_description.description: AiDash is making critical infrastructure industries climate-resilient and sustainable with satellites and AI. Using our full-stack SaaS solutions, customers in electric, gas, and water utilities, transportation, and construction are transforming asset inspection and maintenance - and complying with biodiversity net gain mandates and carbon capture goals. Our customers deliver ROI in their first year of deployment with reduced costs, improved reliability, and achieved sustainability goals. Learn more at www.aidash.com.

about_short_description.short_description: AiDash is a SaaS company enabling climate-resilient and sustainable infrastructure with satellites and AI.

product.name: Intelligent Vegetation Management System (IVMS)
product.description: A system that helps utilities manage vegetation around their infrastructure using satellite imagery and AI to identify and prioritize areas for maintenance.

product.name: Biodiversity Net Gain Management System (BNGAI)
product.description: A tool designed for managing biodiversity and carbon programs, utilizing satellite data to monitor and enhance biodiversity net gains.

product.name: Integrity and Encroachment Management System (IEMS)
product.description: A system for surveying pipelines and their right-of-ways (ROWs) to detect integrity threats and encroachments using satellite technology.

product.name: Climate Risk Intelligence System (CRIS)
product.description: A system that provides forecasts and insights on climate risks like storms or wildfires, helping utilities and other industries prepare for and mitigate these risks.
